The only anime I've ever liked and will ever like:

 http://www.glogster.com/media/2/5/55/58/5555866.jpg

Azumanga Daioh, Angel Beats, Baccano!, Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood, The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya, Minami-Ke, Pani Poni Dash, Rozen Maiden, To aru Majutsu no Index, To aru Kagaku no Railgun, and Toradora are all very good ones.
